snippet: Silent heart attacks are even more common in older adults than heart attacks that immediately come to the attention of doctors and patients, according to recent study in The Journal of the American Medical Association
abstract: Silent heart attacks are even more common in older adults than heart attacks that immediately come to the attention of doctors and patients, according to recent study in The Journal of the American Medical Association

headline.main: The Deadly Threat of Silent Heart Attacks
